text: Base of Seven Falls, March 2010 Bear Canyon, located in the Sabino Canyon recreation area of the Coronado National Forest near Tucson, Arizona, offers views of the Santa Catalina Mountains to the north. Accessible by tram or foot from the Sabino Canyon visitors' center, Bear Canyon contains such attractions as the seasonal Seven Falls and Thimble Peak. ==Sources and external links== *Sabino Canyon Recreation Area *Map of Bear Canyon Category:Santa Catalina Mountains Category:Canyons and gorges of Arizona Category:Geography of Tucson, Arizona Category:Landforms of Pima County, Arizona
title: Bear Canyon
